column1: * 1926 - American author Poul Anderson is born.
* 1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the lecture "Beowulf: The Monsters and the Critics" to the British Academy.
* 1951 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Iona and Peter Opie.
* 1955 - The second episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1980 - The BBC parody series Hordes of the Things first airs.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in the United Kingdom.
